text: The Mask Zodiac (Thai: เดอะแมสก์ จักรราศี) is the eighth season of The Mask Singer, a Thai singing competition program presented by Kan Kantathavorn. The program airs on Workpoint TV on Thursday at 20:05, starting from August 29, 2019. The tournament format is different from other side series. It has only 12 contestants. This season combines zodiac signs and astrology. == Panel of Judges == {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" !No. !Name !Profession |- |1 |Kapol Thongplub |DJ, MC |- |2 |Mum Laconics |Singer |- |3 |Maneenuch Smerasut |Singing Teacher |- |4 |Apissada Kreurkongka |Actress, Model |- |5 |Kiattisak Udomnak |MC |- |6 |Jakkawal Saothongyuttitum |Music Producer, Composer |- |7 |Siriporn Yooyord |Comedienne, Singer |- |8 |Thanawat Prasitsomporn |MC |- |9 |Akhamsiri Suwanasuk |Actress |- |10 |Samapon Piyapongsiri |MC, DJ, Actor |- |11 |Puttachat Pongsuchat |DJ, Actress |- |12 |Yutthana Boonaom |Music Company Executive |- |} == First Round == {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" !Order !Episode !Stage Name !Song !Identity !Profession !Result |- | rowspan="4" |1 | rowspan="4" |EP.1 |Scorpio |อย่าฝากความหวัง + เงา + Reflection | colspan="2" | style="text-align:center;
